chrom.description: A string representing the chromosome region to be plotted

chromstart.description: An int start position on chromosome to be plotted

chromend.description: An int end position on chromosome to be plotted

assembly.description: A string represnting the default genome assembly as a string or a\link[plotgardener]{assembly} object

fontsize.description: A numeric specifying text fontsize in points

fontcolor.description: A string or vector of length 2 indicatingthe fontcolors for the plus strand and minus strand gene labels

fill.description: A string or vector of length 2 indicating thestrand fill colors for the plus strand and minus strand plot elements

geneOrder.description: A vector (ordered character) of gene names toprioritize when labeling genes

geneHighlights.description: A dataframe of two-columns with a column named "gene"containing gene names as strings to highlight and a named column "color"containing corresponding highlight colors

geneBackground.description: A string, if \code{geneHighlights} is given, indicating the color for genes that are not highlighted

strandLabels.description: A logical value indicating whether to include+ and - strand labels to the left of the gene track

stroke.description: A numeric value indicating the stroke width for genebody outlines

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying genes plot x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b"combined with a numeric value specifying genes plot y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying genes plot width

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying genes plot height

just.description: A string or character vector describing the justification of genes plot relative to its (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to use if\code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are only givenas numerics

draw.description: A logical value indicating whether graphics outputshould be produced

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
